answers.answer: Cysts are fluid-filled sacks.   They are very common.  Most people never know they have them until they have a scan for an unrelated condition.
The above is correct, liver cysts are common.  Most doctors take a wait and see approach to them with simple montoring of blood work and imaging.Take care.
